short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the own.Page Graphical Shell

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Warning: This extension is currently in beta testing and may have bugs or other issues that could potentially harm your browser or compromise your privacy. We strongly advise that you proceed with caution and do not install this extension on any critical or sensitive systems or devices. Additionally, please report any problems or concerns to the developer or support team to help improve the overall stability and security of this extension."

The "Own Page" extension is a convenient tool that allows users to quickly and easily open other web pages within their browser. With this extension installed, users can access their favorite websites without the need to manually type in the URL or navigate through bookmarks.

To use the "Own Page" extension, users simply need to click on the extension icon in their browser's toolbar. This will open a drop-down menu where they can enter the URL of the website they wish to visit. Once the URL has been entered, users can either click the "Go" button or hit the "Enter" key on their keyboard to open the webpage.

Additionally, users can customize the extension by adding their frequently visited websites to a list of favorites. This makes it even easier to access these websites as they can be quickly accessed from the drop-down menu without the need to enter the URL each time.

The "Own Page" extension is compatible with most popular browsers, including Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge. It is lightweight and easy to use, making it a useful tool for anyone who frequently visits a variety of websites. Whether you're a student, professional, or simply an avid internet user, the "Own Page" extension is sure to make your browsing experience more efficient and convenient.
